name: Global Mapper Package File
summary: Learn about .GMP files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: The GMP file is designed to help Global Mapper users share data with each other more efficiently. The file can contain data in any format, whether it is raster, vector, or elevation. The GMP file is also useful for creating backups of datasets because it can be easily imported if the original data is lost or hardware fails.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
